name: Masashi Goto Memorial, Uintah Mtns, Utah
description: Nice grassy spot near a monument to Masashi Goto, a Japanese aviator who died in a crash not far from the where the monument has been placed.  He was attempting a flight to navigate most of his way around the world in 1929.
comments: Not a campground, but plenty of parking space and plenty of grassy areas around the momument.  My grandson laid down on the pavement to enjoy the warmth of the sun.
